meanings.sent1: She preshrank the fabric before sewing the dress.
meanings.sent2: The fabric preshrank nicely, so the dress fit perfectly.
meanings.sent3: He preshrank the material, but the dress still turned out too small!
meanings.sent4: The fabric preshrank like magic, making the sewing process easier.
meanings.sent5: Preshrinking the cloth beforehand saved a lot of trouble later on.

meanings.definition: preshrank: to shrink (fabric) before it is made into a garment
meanings.sent1: Before making the shirt, she preshrank the fabric to avoid any surprises.
meanings.sent2: It is important to preshrink the material to prevent the final product from shrinking.
meanings.sent3: The tailor preshrank the cloth, ensuring the shirt would fit just right.
meanings.sent4: She preshrank the fabric meticulously, not wanting any mishaps during sewing.
meanings.sent5: Preshrinking the fabric beforehand is a smart way to ensure a proper fit.

meanings.definition: preshrank: already shrunk before being used
meanings.sent1: The preshrank shirt fit him perfectly.
meanings.sent2: She loved the preshrank jeans because they didn't shrink in the wash.
meanings.sent3: The preshrank sweater kept her warm on chilly evenings.
meanings.sent4: He wore his preshrank socks for extra comfort.
meanings.sent5: The preshrank fabric felt soft and cozy against her skin.
